author: Hakeem Irfan Rashid
title: Cyber Police surveillance aiding fight against COVID-19 outbreak in Kashmir
description: The cyber police station in Kashmir registered its first FIR on February 17,2020 against people for defying government orders on social media. The FIR was registered within few weeks after the cell came into existence through a government notification.
content:
Srinagar: Cyber police in Kashmir is helping the administration to trace and monitor COVID19 positive cases, suspects and contacts besides aggressively tracking social media users some of whom were recently involved in circulation of fake government orders.
